title: invalid username/password combination problem
body:
So for the past few days my friend and  I can't log in into our main accounts. we tried spell checking, typing slowing and everything. I even tried resetting my password but nothing shows up in my email. This is really frustrating, specially since I'm not even lvl 30 on this account.

btw my summoner name is jodiaz, i there a way to recover my account?

replies.body: If you're having trouble logging into the client, double check and make sure that you're connected to your correct region.  The most common cases are being on another server, like on EUW when their account is actually on NA.  If the issue persists, then reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and we can look into any recovery if needed.  I hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZoYERZAw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-27T17:33:00.390+0000)
>
> If you're having trouble logging into the client, double check and make sure that you're connected to your correct region.  The most common cases are being on another server, like on EUW when their account is actually on NA.  If the issue persists, then reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and we can look into any recovery if needed.  I hope that helps!

Yeah, I forgot to mention i made sure to check it was in NA region and after trying everything i read on the Internet... anyway, I got it back after submitting a ticket. Thank you guys.
